name: Special Education Preschool Grants
objective: To provide grants to States to assist them  in providing special education and related services to children with disabilities ages 3 through 5 years, and at a State's discretion, to 2- year- old children with disabilities who will reach age three during the school year.
sub_agency_name: Office of Special Education and Rehabilitative Services
applicant_types: State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA), as amended, Part B, Section 619, 20 U.S.C. 1419.

rules_regulations: Program regulations are at 34 CFR Part 300; 34 CFR Parts 76-77, 79, 81-82, 84-86, and 97-99; and 2 CFR Part 200.
